name: Campground Volunteer Fire Department
description: Non-profit volunteer fire department dedicated to serving the Campground community and surrounding areas. Services include firefighting, emergency response, weather emergencies, gas leaks, and other emergency situations. All firefighters are volunteers who maintain full-time jobs while providing emergency services to the community. Weekly training meetings held on Tuesdays at 6:30 PM.
source: Verified from official website, Facebook page, and multiple sources
notes: Volunteer fire department. All firefighters are unpaid volunteers who maintain full-time jobs. Training meetings held weekly on Tuesdays at 6:30 PM. Accepts tax-deductible donations through PayPal.
eligibility: Open to all residents in service area
appointment_required: No for emergencies, yes for training meetings
